# Download tinygltf header

You need to download the tinygltf header file and place it in this directory.

```bash
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/syoyo/tinygltf/release/tiny_gltf.h -o third_party/tiny_gltf.h
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nothings/stb/master/stb_image.h -o third_party/stb_image.h
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nothings/stb/master/stb_image_write.h -o third_party/stb_image_write.h
```

Or run the download script:
```bash
./download_deps.sh
```
